chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (a b : R) (delta : R -> posreal), ~ ~ (exists ptd : SF_seq, pointed_subdiv ptd /\ fine delta ptd /\ SF_h ptd = Rmin a b /\ last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) = Rmax a b)

Premises:
Record posreal : Set := mkposreal { pos : R; cond_pos : 0 < pos } For mkposreal: Argument scopes are [R_scope _]
*** [ R : Set ]
Rmax = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then y else x : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
fine = fun (delta : R -> posreal) (ptd : SF_seq) => forall i : nat, (i < SF_size ptd)%nat -> ith_step ptd i < delta (nth 0 (SF_ly ptd) i) : (R -> posreal) -> SF_seq -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
Record SF_seq (T : Type) : Type := mkSF_seq { SF_h : R; SF_t : seq (R * T) } For SF_seq: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For mkSF_seq: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For SF_seq: Argument scope is [type_scope] For mkSF_seq: Argument scopes are [type_scope R_scope seq_scope]
SF_h = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => let (SF_h, _) := s in SF_h : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
SF_lx = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => SF_h s :: unzip1 (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
Rmin = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then x else y : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
pointed_subdiv = fun ptd : SF_seq => forall i : nat, (i < SF_size ptd)%nat -> nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_ly ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) (S i) : SF_seq -> Prop
KH_fine = fun a b : R => within (fun ptd : SF_seq => pointed_subdiv ptd /\ SF_h ptd = Rmin a b /\ last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) = Rmax a b) KH_filter : R -> R -> (SF_seq -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope function_scope]
Riemann_fine = fun a b : R => within (fun ptd : SF_seq => pointed_subdiv ptd /\ SF_h ptd = Rmin a b /\ last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) = Rmax a b) (locally_dist (fun ptd : SF_seq => seq_step (SF_lx ptd))) : R -> R -> (SF_seq -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope function_scope]
Riemann_fine_unif_part : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), (forall a0 b0 : R, a0 <= b0 -> a0 <= f a0 b0 <= b0) -> a <= b -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) <= (b - a) / (INR n + 1) /\ pointed_subdiv (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n)) /\ SF_h (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n)) = a /\ last (SF_h (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) (SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) = b
Riemann_sum_Chasles_0 : forall (f : R -> ?V) (M x : R) (ptd : SF_seq) (eps : posreal), (forall x0 : R, SF_h ptd <= x0 <= last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> norm (f x0) < M) -> SF_h ptd <= x <= last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> pointed_subdiv ptd -> seq_step (SF_lx ptd) < eps -> norm (minus (plus (Riemann_sum f (SF_cut_down ptd x)) (Riemann_sum f (SF_cut_up ptd x))) (Riemann_sum f ptd)) < 2 * eps * M where ?V : [ |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
Riemann_sum_le : forall (f g : R -> R) (ptd : SF_seq), pointed_subdiv ptd -> (forall t : R, SF_h ptd <= t <= last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> f t <= g t) -> Riemann_sum f ptd <= Riemann_sum g ptd
Riemann_sum_zero : forall (f : R -> ?V) (ptd : SF_seq), SF_sorted Rle ptd -> SF_h ptd = last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> Riemann_sum f ptd = zero where ?V : [ |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
Riemann_sum_norm : forall (f : R -> ?V) (g : R -> R) (ptd : SF_seq), pointed_subdiv ptd -> (forall t : R, SF_h ptd <= t <= last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> norm (f t) <= g t) -> norm (Riemann_sum f ptd) <= Riemann_sum g ptd where ?V : [ |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
KH_filter = fun P : SF_seq -> Prop => exists delta : R -> posreal, forall ptd : SF_seq, fine delta ptd -> P ptd : (SF_seq -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scope is [function_scope]
adapted_couple = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (l lf : Rlist) => ordered_Rlist l /\ pos_Rl l 0 = Rmin a b /\ pos_Rl l (Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l)) = Rmax a b /\ Rlength l = S (Rlength lf) /\ (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l))%nat -> constant_D_eq f (open_interval (pos_Rl l i) (pos_Rl l (S i))) (pos_Rl lf i)) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rlist -> Rlist -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _ _]
SF_cut_up_cons_1 : forall (h : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq) (x : R), fst h <= x < SF_h ptd -> SF_cut_up (SF_cons h ptd) x = SF_cons (x, Rmax (snd h) x) ptd
ptd_sort : forall ptd : SF_seq, pointed_subdiv ptd -> SF_sorted Rle ptd
Riemann_sum_const : forall (v : ?V) (ptd : SF_seq), Riemann_sum (fun _ : R => v) ptd = scal (last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) - SF_h ptd) v where ?V : [ |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
SF_cut_up_cons_2 : forall (h : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq) (x : R), fst h <= SF_h ptd <= x -> SF_cut_up (SF_cons h ptd) x = SF_cut_up ptd x
SF_cut_down_cons_2 : forall (h : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq) (x : R), fst h <= SF_h ptd <= x -> SF_cut_down (SF_cons h ptd) x = SF_cons h (SF_cut_down ptd x)
is_RInt_ext : forall (f g : R -> ?V) (a b : R) (l : ?V), (forall x : R, Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> f x = g x) -> is_RInt f a b l -> is_RInt g a b l where ?V : [ |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
Riemann_sum_rcons : forall (f : R -> ?V) (ptd : SF_seq) (l0 : R * R), Riemann_sum f (SF_rcons ptd l0) = plus (Riemann_sum f ptd) (scal (fst l0 - last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd)) (f (snd l0))) where ?V : [ |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
SF_cut_down_cons_1 : forall (h : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq) (x : R), fst h <= x < SF_h ptd -> SF_cut_down (SF_cons h ptd) x = SF_cons (fst h, Rmin (snd h) x) (SF_nil x)
Riemann_sum_cons : forall (f : R -> ?V) (h0 : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq), Riemann_sum f (SF_cons h0 ptd) = plus (scal (SF_h ptd - fst h0) (f (snd h0))) (Riemann_sum f ptd) where ?V : [ |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
mkStepFun : forall (a b : R) (fe : R -> R), IsStepFun fe a b -> StepFun a b
last_unif_part : forall (x0 a b : R) (n : nat), last x0 (unif_part a b n) = b
is_RInt = fun (V : NormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (If : V) => filterlim (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (b - a)) (Riemann_sum f ptd)) (Riemann_fine a b) (locally If) : forall V : NormedModule R_AbsRing, (R -> V) -> R -> R -> V -> Prop Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope R_scope R_scope _]
SF_cat_pointed : forall x y : SF_seq, last (SF_h x) (SF_lx x) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> pointed_subdiv x -> pointed_subdiv y -> pointed_subdiv (SF_cat x y)
head_unif_part : forall (x0 a b : R) (n : nat), head x0 (unif_part a b n) = a
is_RInt_Chasles : forall (f : R -> ?V) (a b c : R) (l1 l2 : ?V), is_RInt f a b l1 -> is_RInt f b c l2 -> is_RInt f a c (plus l1 l2) where ?V : [ |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
ex_RInt_SF : forall (f : R -> ?V) (s : SF_seq), SF_sorted Rle s -> let a := SF_h s in let b := last (SF_h s) (unzip1 (SF_t s)) in ex_RInt (SF_fun (SF_map f s) zero) a b where ?V : [ |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
is_subdivision = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (l : Rlist) => {l0 : Rlist & adapted_couple f a b l l0} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rlist -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _]
is_RInt_SF : forall (f : R -> ?V) (s : SF_seq), SF_sorted Rle s -> let a := SF_h s in let b := last (SF_h s) (unzip1 (SF_t s)) in is_RInt (SF_fun (SF_map f s) zero) a b (Riemann_sum f s) where ?V : [ |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
SF_last_cat : forall x y : SF_seq, last (SF_h x) (SF_lx x) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> last (SF_h (SF_cat x y)) (SF_lx (SF_cat x y)) = last (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) where ?T : [ |- Type]
is_RInt_const : forall (a b : R) (v : ?V), is_RInt (fun _ : R => v) a b (scal (b - a) v) where ?V : [ |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
ex_RInt = fun (V : NormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (a b : R) => exists If : V, is_RInt f a b If : forall V : NormedModule R_AbsRing, (R -> V) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope R_scope R_scope]
